title: Currently at 999 wins!
body:
May a Rioter help me get to 1000? It would be much appreciated :)
Or is that no longer a thing?

replies.body: Yea they usually would reply in the forums for a game.. just wait on it. Don't play norms until you get a reply. They are usually very nice and will want to play in your 1000th win game.
havn't heard of it being done for a long ass time
